casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jerry Wayne CONNER. No. 219A91-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 14, 2006. Kenneth Rose, Durham, Mark Kleinschmidt, for Jerry W. Conner. Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of October 2006 by Attorney General Motion to Vacate Stay of Execution:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of December 2006."
